## Installation

You can install the package with `remotes` from Github, see [changes](news/index.html).

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("news-r/phrasenets") # github
```

## Example

```{r}
library(phrasenets)

data(reuters)

reuters %>% 
  phrase_net(text) %>% 
  filter_net(c("a", "the")) %>% 
  dplyr::filter(occurences > 5) %>% 
  plot_sigmajs()
```
